info.title: Subway Fresh Menu APIs
info.description: APIs to get catalog for a given country and menu information for any Subway location

get.description: For a given country and language, API provides full menu catalog. Language is optional; If no language is specificed, catalog is provided in all languages for a given country.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: ISO-2 Country Code for which menu catalog needs to be retrieved

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: ISO-2 Language Code for which translations needs to be sent. If no language code is sent, translations for all available languages are sent.

externalDocs.description: Refer to list of Master Error Codes for the potential error codes and messages

200.description: Menu catalog for a given country sent in response sucessfully.

products.name: Turkey Breast & Black Forest Ham Sandwich
Turkey Breast & Black Forest Ham Sandwich

404.description: Requested country menu catalog does not exist

example.message: Menu catalog not found for a given country.

detail.message: Menu catalog not found for Country, CA.

500.description: The server has encountered a situation it doesnt know how to handle.

value.message: Unknown, Internal System Error; Please try

detail.message: Unknown, Internal System Error; Please try

get.description: Menu, with product id and pricing information for a given location id will be provided. Menu pricing is specific to the store.

parameters.name: locationId
parameters.description: ID of the location for which menu is being requested.

externalDocs.description: Refer to list of Master Error Codes for the potential error codes and messages

200.description: Location specfic menu returned in response sucessfully.

404.description: Requested location menu does not exist

example.message: Location Menu not found for a given Restaurant location.

detail.message: Location Menu not found for a given Restaurant location, with locationId 37082-0

500.description: The server has encountered a situation it doesnt know how to handle.

value.message: Unknown, Internal System Error; Please try

detail.message: Unknown, Internal System Error; Please try

categories.description: A list of all categories and sub-categories in the menu catalog for a given country

masterProducts.description: A list of all master products available in the menu catalog for a given country. See Master Product defintion.

products.description: A list of all products available in the menu catalog for a given country. See  Product defintion.

buildTypes.description: A list of all product build types in the menu catalog for a given country. See  Build Type defintion.

options.description: A list of all options  available in the menu catalog for a given country. See  Options defintion.

nutrition.description: A list of all nutrional facts that can be provided for the products menu catalog for a given country.

sortOrder.description: Sorting order in which this category needs to be displayed with respect to other categories within the same level (i.e. this value is unqiue within the parent level vs child level)

parentCategoryId.description: Parent Category id for this Category. If Parent Category ID is missing, then this Category is the Parent. Only child catagories will have the Parent Category ID populated.

publishDate.description: date when this category has been published by the Subway systems.

translations.description: an array of translations for each culture requested and available within Subway system.

ModifierGroupBase.description: Modifiers array and a related list of applicable related modifier groups available in the menu being catalog for a given country.

invisible.description: if this modifier group needs to be visible as the option to the consumer. For example, protein modifierGroup is not visible as a modifier group

ModifierGroupDefinition.description: Modifiers array and a related list of applicable related modifier groups available in the menu being catalog for a given country.

translations.description: an array of translations for each culture requested and available within Subway system.

ModifierGroupOptions.description: Modifiers array and a related list of applicable related modifier groups available in the menu being catalog for a given country.

options.description: Array of allowed options in this modifier group

defaultOptions.description: Array of default options in this modifier group

NutritionFact.description: Nutritional facts and their corresponding ID. The nutrition value will be provided at the product level and at each option.buildType level. Product level nutrition values against each nutritional facts will be for default options.

name.description: Name of the Nutritional fact,. For example, Service Size, Total Fat, Calories etc.

id.description: id of the nutritional fact which is used as reference in the products and options to provide nutritional values against Nutritional Fact ID.

sortOrder.description: Sorting order of the option as to how options are displayed

modifierGroup.description: Modifier group name to which this option belongs to.

buildTypes.description: All the build types and its coressponding nutitional values that this option is applicable for.

translations.description: an array of translations for each culture requested and available within Subway system.

modifierGroups.description: Modifier groups nested under this option

nutrition.description: Nutrition values for a given option/build type. If the default options are changed to different options, nutritional values needs to be recalculated based on the values provided here. It should be noted, in the current release, nutrition rounding rules are not supported but we plan to support  in the future releases

categories.description: Array of Category IDs to which this Master Product belongs to.

translations.description: an array of translations for each culture requested and available within Subway system.

name.description: an array of translations for each culture requested and available within Subway system.

translations.description: an array of translations for each culture requested and available within Subway system.

buildTypeId.description: Build Type id for this product. A list of all build types, its id's and details are provided in the BuildType array. This id is the reference to one of the objects in that array.

publishDate.description: Date when this product has been published within the Subway systems.

masterProductId.description: Master Product ID to which this product belongs to.

nutrition.description: Nutritional information provided at the product level is the calcualted value for the default options. If the options are modified, then the nutritional information needs to be calculated based on the values under option for a given build type. Rounding rules for nutritional information is not supported in the current release.

modifierGroups.description: Modifier Groups array i.e. Bread, Cheese, Protein etc with options within those modifier groups. In general min/max rules;  min=0; max=0; indicates Not available/applicable; This scenario does not exist for modifier group level. If it is not applicable, modifier group will not show up under product. min=1; max=1; indicates mandatory min=0; max = n; indicates optional but can have a max upto n number  min=0; max value not present means  optional but there is no max limit set min=n; max value not present means minimum n quantity but no max limit

prices.description: Array of pricing scheme. As part of onboarding, Partner will be provided with the id of the pricing schemes that they needs to be using.

price.description: price value for this pricing scheme.

items.description: An array of item prices per pricing scheme

displayName.description: display name of the of the business entity where it is being used.

imageUrl.description: relative URL of image. It needs to be used in combination with baseImageURL value.

message.description: pre-defined/standard error message describing the error code/error scenario
runtime error message that caused the error

additionalProperties.description: In this section object keys on which error occured. INVALID_ITEM_ID: [1, 2, 4]

retry.description: true, if this transaction can be retried by the partner otherwise false
